Name: LU 51 - Landmarks, Melrose Concourse NCP, Bronx (C 240174 HAX)
Title: Resolution approving the application submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (“HPD”) and the decision of the City Planning Commission, ULURP No. C 240174 HAX, approving the designation of an Urban Development Action Area, an Urban Development Action Area Project, and the disposition of city-owned property located at 12 Gouverneur Place (Block 2388, Lot 55), 1169 Washington Avenue (Block 2389, Lot 47), and 404 Claremont Parkway (Block 2896, Lot 96), Borough of the Bronx, Community District 3, to a developer to be selected by HPD (L.U. No. 51; C 240174 HAX).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
